verses.text: Mamin Jehová, schaocab' a k'ol ab'an tas swala', yujto ilb'aj in k'ool, te malaj pax wip swab'i.
Colineli, yujto k'anab'ajum in t'ayach. Mamin, colin a in a checab' in tik, yujto a ach tzach wak'och yipoc in k'ool.
Mamin Jehová, ok'ocab' a k'ool t'ayin. Masanil k'u swal in b'a t'ayach.
Mamin, ak' tzalajb'oc in k'ol a in a checab' in tik, yujto a t'ayach tzin lesalwi.
Mamin, te wach' ach, ak'um ach lajwoc chukal. Te niwan a wach'k'olal aycot t'a yib'anh heb' syal sb'a t'ayach.
Mamin Jehová, ab' in lesal, maclej ab' tas tzin k'an t'ayach.
Ayic ayin och t'a syaelal swal in b'a t'ayach, yujto tzach tak'witaxon t'a in lesal.
Mamin Cajalil, malaj junocxo Dios icha wal ach tik. Mamin, malaj junok mach syal sb'oan icha tas tza b'o tik.
Mamin, a ach ix a b'o masanil niwac chonhab'. Ol ja heb' yak'em sb'a t'ayach, ol yalan wach' lolonel heb' t'ayach,
yujto a achnhej wal Dios ach. Niwan elk'ochi, satub'tac tas tza k'ulej.
Mamin Jehová, ch'ox a b'e t'ayin yic wach' tzin b'eyb'alej tas tza nib'ej t'a smasanil in k'ool. Ak' stek'anil in pensar tik yic wach' naanachnhej wuuj.
Ach Vajalil, ach in Diosal, ol walnhej wach' lolonel t'ayach t'a smasanil in k'ool. Ol ach wik'nhejchaanh t'a masanil tiempo.
Yelxo wal te niwan a wach'k'olal t'ayin. Maj in a chab'atlaj t'a yet'tal heb' chamnac.
Ach in Diosal, jun wal b'ulanh heb' ak'umtac scot t'ayin. Malaj jab'oc yok'elk'olal heb', sgana heb' in smilanchamoc. Malaj elk'och t'a sat heb'.
Ha ach xo tik ach Dios Vajalil, te ay a wach'k'olal, te ay ok'elk'olal. Manh k'unoc scot yowal a k'ool, tzak'elk'och tas tzala'.
Ok'oc wal a k'ol t'ayin, ilincoti. Ak' wal wip, tzin a colanel a in a checab' in tik.
Ak' a wach'k'olal t'ayin t'a sjichanil, yic a ol yilan heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, ol q'uixwoc heb', yujto a ach Jehová ach tzach kolwaj wed'oc, tzak'an sniwanil in k'ool.
